original: 母甄氏因怨言被曹丕賜死，曹叡因母獲罪，降為平原侯。黃初三年三月，曹丕又復其爵位，晉封為平原王。
text: Mother Zhen was given to death by Cao Pi due to complaints, Cao Rui was convicted of her mother and was reduced to Pingyuanhou. In March of the third year of Huangchu, Cao Pi regained his knighthood and was named the King of Plains in Jin.
